name: LD45 - rail shooter prototype
description:
At the beginning was the Void...

It's our entry for LDJam45. We've come across many technical issues, which delayed us and prevented us from making a proper level design. Or even a proper complete level (we had planned to create 2 of them).

However, it was a fun Ludum Dare, and we'll probably make a more complete version soon!

The game was created with Godot engine 3.1.

Tools used :

  • Godot Engine
  • Blender
  • Gimp
  • Nanoloop Mono
  • Audacity

We hope you'll enjoy the journey in our demo game!

You'll find in the downloads the complete musical track of the level, because you won't be able to hear it in the game.
